description: The name of the "return" block from the Custom Reporters extension. {v} is replaced with a slot to insert a value.
Context menu item to change a command-shaped custom block into a reporter. Part of the Custom Reporters extension.
Context menu item to change a reporter-shaped custom block into a statement/command. Part of the Custom Reporters extension.
Button in extension list to learn how to use the "return" block from the Custom Reporters extension.
